import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' //import notes from '../assets/data' import { ReactComponent as ArrowLeft } from '../assets/arrow-left.svg' import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; const NotePage=(props) => { const params = useParams(); // vervanger van match.params console.log("PROPS:", props,params) let NoteId=params.id let note=notes.find(note => note.id === Number(NoteId)) console.log("NOTEID:",NoteId) return (

{note?.body}
) } export default NotePage
